documents.document: Finding it hard to focus on day to day activities, alcohol is helping my helplessness, the bandaids cover my face so I can function 😢
Love to all my American friends; stay strong!

The @nodebots_nz swarm is growing https://t.co/Q6qKhFoqDt
After a hard day's work, there's nothing better than some freshly mafipulated whiskey.
@johnclegg @buildmaster the European ones cost much more to maintain later down the track

@buildmaster heh, so did I… Urbanification is in full swing

@buildmaster I guess telling people they’ve sinned is a thankless job
A screaming preacher outside the train station was just what my morning was missing

Installed open-wrt on my router for christmas, ssh’ing into a router to setup IP tables is the best
